      • PROP_KEEP_ALL_TOKENS

        @S4Boolean(defaultValue=false)
public static final java.lang.String PROP_KEEP_ALL_TOKENS
        The property that controls whether or not we keep all tokens. If this is set to false, only word tokens are retained, otherwise all tokens are retained.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
